name: Bow & Arrow - Amazing Cow Labs!
description:
Intro:
Bow & Arrow is a small "quasi"-remake of the John di Troia's Bow & Arrow.
You can find more info about the original game in Classic DOS Games
It was developed in C# using Monogame.
As usual, you are very welcomed to share and hack it.
Dedication:
This game is dedicated to Instituto Mario Penna.
Take a 5 min break, take a look their site and find a way to help them :D
Thanks! <3
More Info:
Web Page : amazingcow.com
Facebook : facebook.com/amazingcow
Twitter  :  twitter.com/amazingcow
